cause.description:
The Facebook Mobile service allows for instant Facebook updates directly to your cell phone. Unfortunately, Facebook and T-Mobile can't come to an agreement to allow the service to work between the two.
1. Facebook and T-Mobile come to an agreement.
2. The agreement includes T-Mobile's complete support of the Facebook Mobile service.
3. The agreement includes Facebook's willingness to allow T-Mobile to use the Facebook Mobile service.
cause.mission: allow T-Mobile users to use the Facebook Mobile service.
cause.name: Facebook Mobile and T-Mobile Agreement
